g.text: 0.01 ps. NVE ensemble is used in the simulation, and the thermostat atoms are set to ensure reasonable
outward heat conduction using the direct velocity scaling method. Initially, velocities of atoms, except
ﬁxed boundary ones, are set randomly under an equivalent temperature
process is divided into three phases: relaxation, loading and sliding. Before loading, the system is
relaxed to reach its minimumenergy conﬁguration. Then, the tip is pressed to the substrate to apply
the load, and the tip slides along
